edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SobelEdgeFilter.SobelEdgeFilter (  )  

00022                             {
00023         double[][] xc = new double[3][3];
00024         double[][] yc = new double[3][3];
00025         xc[0][0] = xc[0][2] = yc[0][0] = yc[2][0] = -1;
00026         xc[0][1] = yc[1][0] = -2;
00027         xc[2][0] = xc[2][2] = yc[0][2] = yc[2][2] = 1;
00028         xc[2][1] = yc[1][2] = 2;
00029         gx = new ConvolutionFilter(xc);
00030         gy = new ConvolutionFilter(yc);
00031     }

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SobelEdgeFilter.edgeFilter ( final LatLonGrid  input,
File  out 
) 

00057                                                                   {
00058         LatLonGrid g1 = gx.convolve(input);
00059         KmlWriter.debugWrite(g1, out, "gx");
00060         LatLonGrid g2 = gy.convolve(input);
00061         KmlWriter.debugWrite(g2, out, "gy");
00062         for (int i=0; i < g1.getNumLat(); ++i){
00063             for (int j=0; j < g1.getNumLon(); ++j){
00064                 if (g1.getValue(i,j) != g1.getMissing() && g2.getValue(i,j) != g2.getMissing()){
00065                     int gradient = Math.abs( g1.getValue(i, j) ) + Math.abs( g2.getValue(i,j) );
00066                     g1.setValue(i, j, gradient);
00067                 } else {
00068                     g1.setValue(i,j, g1.getMissing());
00069                 }
00070             }
00071         }
00072         return g1;
00073     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SobelEdgeFilter.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00075                                                             {
00076         // create output directory
00077         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("sobel");
00078         
00079         // read input
00080         DataTransform t = new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling();
00081         // DataTransform t = new GlobalPopulation.LinearScaling();
00082         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, t).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00083         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00084                 
00085         SobelEdgeFilter filter = new SobelEdgeFilter();
00086         LatLonGrid edges = filter.edgeFilter(popdensity, out);
00087         KmlWriter.write(edges, out, "edge", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00088         
00089         ConvolutionFilter sm = new ConvolutionFilter(ConvolutionFilter.gauss(11, 11));
00090         popdensity = sm.smooth(popdensity);
00091         edges = filter.edgeFilter(popdensity, null);
00092         KmlWriter.write(edges, out, "smoothedge", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00093         
00094         LatLonGrid saturated = filter.saturate(edges, 5000);
00095         KmlWriter.write(saturated, out, "saturated", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00096     }

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SobelEdgeFilter.saturate ( final LatLonGrid  input,
int  thresh 
)

treat values > thresh as equal to thresh 

00036                                                                   {
00037         LatLonGrid result = LatLonGrid.copyOf(input);
00038         for (int i=0; i < input.getNumLat(); ++i){
00039             for (int j=0; j < input.getNumLon(); ++j){
00040                 if ( result.getValue(i, j) > thresh ){
00041                     result.setValue(i,j, thresh);
00042                 }
00043             }
00044         }
00045         return result;
00046     }
